content.body: My understading was that all of Node.js's `AsyncLocalStorage` could be implemented on top of `AsyncContext`, but I'm looking into reusing some of the Node.js benchmarks for my implementation in V8, and it's not clear to me that `enterWith` is always implementable that way

content.body: oh, wait, maybe that's not actually the case
